short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your Web, Your Way: Customize Any Page with a Click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Program any webpage on the internet using natural language and AI. Now you can control any webpage you view on your computer. For example:

- Frustrated by the lack of spacing between Chinese, English, and numbers, making reading difficult? Tell HolyTrick: "I want spaces between all Chinese, English, and numbers from now on."

- Don't like Baidu's default background? Tell HolyTrick: "Change Baidu's homepage background to a Matrix-style theme."

- Tired of Twitter's suggested follows? Tell HolyTrick: "Hide the recommendation section on the right side of Twitter pages."

- Missing a 'back to top' button on some pages? Tell HolyTrick: "Add a 'back to top' button to all webpages."

...

Any change you can imagine for a webpage, HolyTrick will attempt to make it a reality.

Let's return to the days of GTA cheats and experience the thrill of spawning a tank with just a few keystrokes!
long.zh_CN:
使用自然语言+AI，对互联网上的所有网页进行编程，从此你可以掌控任何在你电脑上查看的网页。如：
- 中文和英文以及数字之间没有空格让你阅读起来十分难受？对有挂说：我要求以后所有的中文和英文、数字之间都有空格。
- 不喜欢 Baidu 的默认背景？对有挂说：以后把 Baidu 首页的背景修改成黑客帝国风
- 不喜欢 Twitter 推荐给我关注的人？对有挂说：以后帮我隐藏 Twitter 页面右边的推荐区
- 有的页面没有回到顶部按钮？对有挂说：我要求以后所有网页都具有回到顶部按钮
...

你能想象得到任何对网页的改变，有挂都会尝试帮你实现。
让我们回到多年前GTA的时刻，享受那种键入作弊码就能掉下坦克的快感吧！
